reviewText: I have seen before . I love it

Over 30 years, I'm fan of YOKO SHIMADA.
After "SHO-GUN",this is the first movie for her act.
But,in Japan, this movie's video program isn't sold yet.
For long time, I wanted to watch this film.
This time, I discovered this item in Amazon.
Soon, I bought from Japan.
She acted for "MIKI" as a marathon runnner.
I think, especially, fan of YOKO SHIMADA must watch this movie.
